name: Ar-Rahman Learning Center

theoryOfChange: By providing authentic knowledge through native speakers and structured curriculum, the institute aims to help students live by the Quran and strengthen their faith.
zakatClaimEvidence: The Cause IQ page for Ar-Rahman Learning Center in Chicago, IL, describes its activities as providing religious knowledge, daily prayer, weekly sermons, congregational prayer, and classes, as well as organizing book fairs and marriage ceremonies.
